definition: an unsuccessful ending to a struggle or contest, win a victory over
details:
noun
- an unsuccessful ending to a struggle or contest
= example: an unsuccessful ending to a struggle or contest
= synonyms: licking
- the feeling that accompanies an experience of being thwarted in attaining your goals
= synonyms: frustration
verb
- win a victory over
= synonyms: overcome, get the better of
- thwart the passage of
= synonyms: kill
